name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-copilot-apis
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat with Work IQ in SPFx
shortDescription: A SharePoint Framework web part that integrates Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat to create an interactive AI assistant with conversational history.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to integrate Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat into a SharePoint Framework React web part. It provides a full conversational interface with chat history, allowing users to interact with Microsoft 365 Copilot directly from SharePoint. The solution includes features like scrollable conversation history, markdown rendering for AI responses, optional web search integration, support for file references and additional context, and the ability to start new conversations with a single click. The chat interface displays both user prompts and AI responses in a clean, organized timeline with timestamps.
